

Wifi chip is connected at PCI ch-2 (0x161c0000): -
=================================================

Step I. lspci | grep 12be
0000:01:00.0 Class 0280: Device 12be:bd31 (rev 01)

Note - 12be is VID of wifi chip and by above lspci command, we know "Addr domain:Bus:Device.Function" ID of wifi chip.


Step II. Traverse path in sysfs.

	# cd /sys/devices/platform/161c0000.pcie/pci0000:00/0000:00:00.0/0000:01:00.0/

Step III. Find resource files.
	#  ls | grep resource                                                        
	O/p- 	resource
		resource0
		resource2

	# cat resource
